text: <@U2H3TT8F2> so when you have an numerical option like `2018` we can't tell if you are referring to the option with `id=2018` or the option with `name=2018`. Whenever you filter by option, we only convert the name -> id if the filter is non-numeric
Oh, I didn't know you could use the name in the query instead of the ID. Has that always been the case?
Nope, I added it when I added the multiselect column type because I was tired of having to query by option id :slightly_smiling_face:
